content:
ClusterNodeType ClusterNodeType Enum

Definition

Namespace:
Assembly:
Microsoft.Azure.Management.HDInsight.dll

A list of roles in a HDInsight Hadoop cluster to run config action on.

In this Article

public enum ClusterNodeType : intPublic Enum ClusterNodeType As Integer

Fields

EdgeNode EdgeNode

The edge nodes of the cluster.

The head nodes of the cluster.
WorkerNode WorkerNode

The worker nodes of the cluster.
ZookeeperNode ZookeeperNode

The zookeper nodes of the cluster.
